name: Direct Insite
overview: Direct Insite delivers on-demand AP and AR solutions that are deployed fast, with minimal cost and operational impact, and provide significant benefits across the financial supply chain. Since it was founded in 1987, Direct Insite has built a track record in automating some of the most demanding financial environments. Today, more than 100,000 corporations use our solutions across 100 countries (representing more than 35 currencies and 17 languages). Direct Insite’s Invoices On-Line (IOL) suite simplifies AP and AR processes such as: electronic invoice distribution/submission, purchase order submission/distribution/acknowledgement, invoice processing/validation, line-item matching, approval routing, invoice consolidation, dispute management, payment portal/processing, and reporting and analysis.

relationships.title: Chairman of the Board of Directors
